Headline: Yellow and Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow and Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier heavy train traffic at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow and Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier heavy train traffic at Howard.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/18th
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/18th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Jackson, LaSalle, Monroe and Dearborn, SB: Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams near Jackson/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Dearborn due to police activity near Jackson/Dearborn.

Northbound buses will operate via Jackson, Lasalle, Monroe and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temp. rerouted NB Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr and Clark; SB Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster and Clark: near Clark/Catalpa.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Clark/Catalpa due to street blockage near Clark/Catalpa.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Bryn Mawr and Clark including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Catalpa, Ashland, Foster and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.
